content: lion brand pattern # w80025-c *cms-preemiehat pdf* skill level easy level 2 size one size preemie 10 inches diameter \ approximately 25 cm hat should be about the size needed to fit an orange microspun article #910 1 ball crochet hook - size e-4 3 5 mm crochet hook - size f-5 3 75 mm a lovely little hat quick and easy ribbed brim is worked flat in row work crown pull up stitches to gather top and sew seam to finish see preemie cap #w80025-k 1 for the knit version *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/preemie-cap-w80025-k
